Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Monica and St. Augustine:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/: n~te ]a~gia eyouab Monika: nem pecs/ri pia~gioc Wgwctinoc: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers of the holy St. Monica, and her son St. Augustine, O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
